slide1.title: Where Quality Meets Its Standard
slide1.description: With certifications and compliance across various countries, we deliver excellence that transcends borders and meets global expectations.

slide2.title: Excellence in Quality Control
slide2.description: Our state-of-the-art facilities ensure every product meets the highest standards of quality and safety. Experience the difference precision makes.

slide3.title: International Standards
slide3.description: With certifications and compliance across various countries, we deliver excellence that transcends borders and meets global expectations.

contactUs.assistTitle: We are always happy to assist you

visimisi.visi: To become a leading company in the sustainable, innovative, and globally competitive fisheries processing industry, while contributing to the welfare of society and the preservation of marine resources.
visimisi.misi1: To produce high-quality and hygienic fishery products.
visimisi.misi3: To expand employment opportunities for the welfare of society.
visimisi.misi4: To export production results overseas and assist the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries in the 'Blue Economy, Advanced Indonesia' program.

about.subtitle: Tentang Kami
about.title: Tentang PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera
about.short: Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is one of the professional seafood processing companies in Indonesia.
about.long: An honor for us to introduce PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is one of the professional seafood processing companies in Indonesia. To stay in the forefront line of the dynamic global fisheries market, we are committed to doing our best to ensure the proper and good processing techniques to produce quality seafood products.

services.heading: Our Services
services.stat2: Weeks in a year with nonstop deliveries

Testimoni.heading: Testimoni from Clients
Testimoni.desc: Working with Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera has been a game-changer for our business. The team is professional, dedicated, and highly skilled at delivering solutions that are tailored to our needs. Their exceptional customer service and expertise in the industry make them an invaluable partner. We highly recommend their services to anyone looking to take their business to the next level.
Testimoni.banner_h1: Real Stories, Real Satisfaction from Our Clients

about_1.title: Who We Are?
about_1.description_1: An honor for us to introduce PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera, one of the professional seafood processing companies in Indonesia. To stay at the forefront of the dynamic global fisheries market, we are committed to ensuring proper and high-standard processing techniques to deliver quality seafood products.
about_1.description_2: Founded in 2017 in Kawasan Industri Makassar, South Sulawesi, Indonesia, our company specializes in the management of fresh and frozen fish. We offer a wide variety of fish from Indonesian seawater, available in various cut types and sizes to meet our customers’ needs.

about_2.title: Our Production & Technology
about_2.description_1: To guarantee premium quality, PT.Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera:
description_2: Selects only the best-quality fish from Indonesian waters.
Processes fish with modern equipment for freshness and hygiene.
Employs experienced professionals for high-standard production.
about_2.description_3: With a cutting-edge facility and strict quality control, we produce hygienic, healthy, and safe-to-consume fresh and frozen seafood for both local and international markets.

about_3.title: Our Values & Commitment
about_3.description_1: At PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera, we operate with a teamwork spirit, working professionally and with dedication from fishing to processing.
description_3: Maintaining sustainable fisheries and marine ecosystems.
Following ethical and proper fishing procedures.
Ensuring hygiene, safety, and quality in every process.
about_3.description_4: By adhering to strict industry standards, we ensure that every product we deliver meets the highest quality expectations.

about_4.title: Continuous Growth & Global Standards
about_4.description_1: We extend our deepest gratitude to all loyal customers who trust us as their premium seafood supplier. Your support drives us to:
description_2: Continuously improve service and product quality.
Contribute positively to Indonesia’s fisheries sector.
Ensure compliance with national and international seafood standards.
about_4.description_3: In the era of globalization, we strive to remain one of the most sought-after seafood processing companies by implementing advanced fishery management programs that cover catching, preparing, storing, and processing.
about_4.description_4: Through the synergy of experienced professionals and cutting-edge technology, PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is committed to delivering the highest-quality seafood products to the world.

footer.about: PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is a professional seafood processing company in Indonesia, committed to delivering high-quality products through the best processing techniques for the global market.
